movement

类 ModifiedRandomDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • movement.MovementModel
      • movement.RandomDirection
        • movement.ModifiedRandomDirection

  • public class ModifiedRandomDirection
extends RandomDirection

    Modified Random Direction movement model as described in: Elizabeth M. Royer, P. Michael Melliar-Smith, and Louise E. Moser, "An Analysis of the Optimum Node Density for Ad hoc Mobile Networks"

    Similar to RandomDirection, except nodes will not move all the way to the edge. Instead they will pick a random direction and move in that direction for a random distance before pausing and picking another direction.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTravelFraction

        protected double getTravelFraction()
        从类复制的说明: RandomDirection
        Returns the fraction of the path to follow towards the edge. This is called after the direction of travel has been picked and the path towards the edge calculated. Returning 1.0 causes the node to travel all the way to the edge, returning 0.5 would cause the node to travel half way, etc.
        覆盖:
        getTravelFraction 在类中 RandomDirection
        返回:
        the fraction of the path to follow towards the edge of the simulation area

      • replicate

        public MovementModel replicate()
        从类复制的说明: MovementModel
        Creates a replicate of the movement model.
        覆盖:
        replicate 在类中 RandomDirection
        返回:
        A new movement model with the same settings as this model
